description.title: About
description.descriptions: SAP C/4HANA is the customer experience suite of five cloud solutions: Commerce Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Customer Data Cloud, Service Cloud, and Sales Cloud.

items.label: Integrated comprehensive processes for lead to cash across SAP business applications
Intelligence capabilities (for example, artificial intelligence and machine learning) and analytics
Harmonization of user experiences across the SAP C/4HANA suite
Extension capabilities, authentication, cloud administration, and user management using the SAP C/4HANA cockpit

bullets.text: Harmonized SAP Fiori 3 look and feel across SAP C/4HANA Suite
Lead to Cash process end-to-end integration across SAP C/4HANA, SAP S/4HANA and SAP Analytics Cloud. Please check the separated roadmap for the Lead-to-Cash process

SAP Customer Order Sourcing: Cloud service for product availability, sourcing, and reservations; Integration into SAP S/4HANA for ATP stock availability incl. delta snapshot; preconfigured rules for distribution centers, stores, and third-party locations; UI to maintain sourcing strategies
Continue look and feel harmonization with SAP Fiori 3
Central Order Service for SAP C/4HANA:  integrated with SAP S/4HANA, SAP Customer Order Sourcing and SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing service
One global identity for all users
Central Order service for SAP C/4HANA - enhancements and integration with SAP Commerce Cloud
SAP Customer Order Sourcing: enhanced sourcing strategies; further extensibility options for sourcing; shipping/transportation data in sourcing strategies, e.g. lead times, schedules, etc.
Central Order service for SAP C/4HANA: Further enhancements and integrations
SAP Customer Order Sourcing: Further enhancements and integrations
SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing service: B2B pricing, configuration and extensibility, pricing for configurable products
